lines.text: [the President briefs the pilots before the final attack]
Good morning.
[PA doesn't work. Turns it on]
"We will not go quietly into the night!" We will not vanish without a fight! We're going to live on! We're going to survive! Today we celebrate our Independence Day!
[crowd cheers]

[walking toward crashed alien plane]
THAT'S RIGHT! THAT'S RIGHT! That's what you get! Look at you, ship all *banged* up! Who's the man? Huh? Who's the man? Wait till I get another plane! I'm-a line all your friends up right beside you!

[climbs on top of alien plane]
Where you at, huh? Huh? Where you at?
[Hiller opens the spaceship. An alien pops up, and Hiller punches it in the head, knocking it back into the ship]
Welcome to earth!

[sits on alien plane and puts cigar in mouth]
Now that's what *I* call a close encounter.
I ain't heard no fat lady!
Forget the fat lady. You're obsessed with fat lady. Just get us out of here!

[talking to the unconscious alien he's dragging]
Y'know, this was supposed to be my weekend off, but noooo. You got me out here draggin' your heavy ass through the burnin' desert with your dreadlocks stickin' out the back of my parachute. You gotta come down here with an attitude, actin' all big and bad...
[yells]
and what the hell is that smell?
[starts kicking the alien, yelling]
I could've been at a barbecue!
[kicks the alien one last time and calms down]
But I ain't mad.
[Hiller and Levinson are about to launch the bomb, knowing they can't escape. They both wave to the alien watching them]
Hey, take a look at the Earthlings. Goodbye!
Y'all take care, all right? Nothing but love for ya. Nothing but love for ya.

[to David]
You think they have any idea what's about to happen to them?
Not a chance in hell. Goodnight!
PEACE!
[launches the bomb]
We're hit! We took a hit!

[yelling]
We're not hit! We're not hit! Stop side-seat driving!

[trying to make a break for the exit]
Left! Left! Tunnel! Tunnel! Exit! Exit! Left!
Where the hell do you think I'm going?
Ok, ok. We're we're we're uh...
[indicating they were communicating]
Uh oh, they're closing up on us... they're closing...
Shut up, shut up, shut up!
Must go faster. Must go faster! Must go faster! Go, go, go, go!
[escapes from the alien ship]
[screaming]
Aaaaaaahhhhhhhhh!
Oh! Elvis has left the building!

[in Elvis voice]
Oh, thank you very much.
[in his own voice]
Oh, I love you man!
All you need is love. John Lennon. Smart man. Shot in the back, very sad.

[Russell's final missile malfunctions]
Do me a favor. Tell my children... I love them very much.
[Sets a collision course]
Up... YOURS!
Good luck, buddy!
Ha-ha-ha! Hello, boys! I'm BAAAAAACK!
[His plane crashes into the unshielded alien ship, destroying it]
Are you all right?

I saw... its thoughts. I saw what they're planning to do. They're like locusts. They're moving from planet to planet... their whole civilization. After they've consumed every natural resource they move on... and we're next. Nuke 'em. Let's nuke the bastards.

[after reversing into the rear wall]
Oops.
W-what do you mean, oops?
Some jerk put this...
[Turns the piece of paper round]
the wrong way round.
Don't say "oops".
What do you say we try that again?
Yes, yes. Yes. Without the "oops". Thataway.
[Points forward]
You really think you can fly that thing?
You really think you can do all that bullshit you just said?
Hey, hey, hey, don't you tell him to shut up! You'd all be dead now if it weren't for my David! None of you did anything to prevent this!
There was nothing we could do! We were totally unprepared for...

AAAHHH, don't give me unprepared! You knew about this for years! What,with that spaceship you found in New Mexico! What was it called... Roswell, New Mexico! And that other place... uh... Area 51, Area 51! You knew then! And you did nothing!
Mr. Levinson, contrary to what you may have read in the tabloids, there is no Area 51. There is no spaceship...
Uh... excuse me, Mr. President? That's not entirely accurate.
What, which part?
They're chasing us!
Really, YOU THINK?
A countdown... wait, a countdown to what David?
First, you strategically position your pieces and when the timing is right you strike. They're using this signal to syncronize their efforts and in 5 hours the countdown will be over.
And then what?
Checkmate.
Oh, my God. I gotta call my brother, my housekeeper, my lawyer. Nah, forget my lawyer.
You punched the President?
He wasn't the President *yet*!
I picked a hell of a day to quit drinkin'.

The only mistake I ever made was to appoint a sniveling little weasel like you Secretary of Defense. However, that is a mistake, I am happy to say, that I don't have to live with. Mr. Nimzicki... you're fired.
Mr. President, I'd sure like to know what you're doing.
I'm a combat pilot, Will. I belong in the air.
They're bringing us in.
When the hell was you gonna tell me?
Oops.
We're gonna have to work on our communication.
Los Angeles, New York, and Washington D.C. have been left in ruins...
Good God! I've been sayin' it. I've been sayin' it for ten damn years. Ain't I been sayin' it, Miguel? Yeah, I've been sayin' it.
I'm sorry, Captain. This is a restricted area. I can't let you pass without clearance.
Okay. Come here. You wanna see my clearance?
[shows the guard the alien wrapped up in a parachute. Guard jumps back]
Maybe I'll just leave this here with you.

[to other guard blocking entrance]
Let them pass! Let them pass!

[to other guard blocking entrance]
Get the hell out the way!

[to the other guard, freaked out]
Did you see that?
[last lines]
Didn't I promise you fireworks?
Yeah.
What your father did was very brave. You should be proud of him.
I am.
I don't understand, where does all this come from? How do you get funding for something like this?
You don't actually think they spend $20,000 on a hammer, $30,000 on a toilet seat, do you?

[Levinson has invited him to pray]
I'm not Jewish.
Nobody's perfect.
If you're so smart, tell me something, how come you go to M.I.T. for 8 years to become a cable repairman?
[Dr. Oaken meets President Whitmore]
Mr. President! Wow! This is... what a pleasure. As you can imagine, they... they don't let us out much.

[TV news anchor reporting]
Once again, the L.A.P.D. is asking Los Angelenos not to fire their guns at the visitor spacecraft. You may inadvertently trigger an interstellar war.
[people have gathered to welcome the aliens]
Oh god, I hope they bring back Elvis.
Everyone's trying to get out of Washington, and we're the only schmucks trying to get in.
[Connie left David to pursue a career]
Haven't you ever wanted to be part of something special?
I was part of something special
What do you want us to do?
Die. Die.
This could be our last night on Earth. You don't want to die a virgin, do you?
Payback's a bitch, ain't it?
Let's kick the tires and light the fires, big daddy!
You scared, man?
No. You?
No. Hold me.
Hey, pay attention!
Something you want to add to this briefing, Captain Hiller?
No, sir, just a little anxious to get up there and whoop E.T.'s ass, that's all!
[David Levinson is getting air sick]
It's Air Force One, for crying out loud, and still he gets sick!
[imitating Rev. Jesse Jackson]
Why we are on this particular mission, we'll never know. But I do know, here today, that the Black Knights will emerge victorious once again.
[first lines]

[answering telephone]
If this isn't an insanely beautiful woman, I'm hangin' up.
Sir, I - I- I think you should listen to this.

[holding cigar]
It's funny, I always thought these things were gonna kill me.
Is that an earthquake?
Not even a four pointer. Go back to sleep.
Look, I really don't think they flew 90 billion light years to come down here and start a fight. Get all rowdy.
[after starting up alien ship]
I have got to get me one of these!
David! What the hell are you doing?
Making a mess!
Yes, this I can see.
[Russell Casse needs an opening to attack during the final battle]
Okay, boys, let's give Mr. Casse some cover. Gentlemen, let's plow the road!

[on the phone]
Ma, I know, just try and stay calm.
Tell her to pack up and leave town.
What?
Just do it!
Ma, listen, pack your stuff and head for Aunt Esther's. Don't argue with me; just go.
[hangs up]
David, why did I just send my mother to Atlanta?

[seeing the approaching explosion]
Oh, crap.

[Anxious about receiving an envelope from NASA]
Ohhh, you're gonna have to do this one...
You're a wuss.
Yeah, whatever, just shut up and read it.
Captain Steven Hiller, Loser...

[taking a leak]
A little shake and they all runnin...
There you go, thinking you're all that. But you are not as charming as you think you are, sir.
Yes, I am.
The Freak Show.
Atlanta, Chicago, Philadelphia, destroyed.
We have also learned that NORAD and our top commandos were the first to be taken out. At this rate, we could be looking at the worldwide destruction of every major city in the next 36 hours.
Then we're being exterminated.
Time's up.

[as David is inspired with the idea for a computer virus]
What's the matter with you?
Genius. My dad. Total genius.
Get on the wire, tell them how to bring those sons of bitches down.

[addressing the nation]
If you feel compelled to leave these cities, please do so, in an orderly fashion.
[shot moves to very chaotic city street]
[deleted scene]

[showing David the inside of the captured alien ship]
This is connected...
[accidentally breaks something]
was... connected to the engine.

[holds out cigar]
This is our victory dance. Not until the fat lady sings.
Oh. Yes, OK.
[takes cigar]

[holds onto cigar]
This is important.
Mm. Fat lady. I gotcha.
Doesn't anybody have any missiles left?
Man, you know I really like Jasmine. You know that, right? Man, you are never gonna get to fly the space shuttle if you marry a stripper.
Is Mommy sleeping now?
Yeah, Mommy is sleeping now.
If I had known I was gonna meet the president, I would've worn a tie. I mean, look at me. I look like a schlemiel.
No, you did NOT shoot that green shit at me!

[indicating the glass panel in front of the alien, who has taken control of President Whitmore's mind]
Is that glass bulletproof?
No, Sir!
[pull out their guns and starts blasting the alien through the glass]
A toast, to the end of the world.
Angelenos are advised to avoid the highways wherever possible.
Oh, yeah, great. *Now* he tells me.
It's the White House, for crying out loud. You can't just go up and ring the doorbell.

[pointing to David's cigar]
Oh, so *this* is healthy?
I could get used to it!
The 3 choppers are steadily approaching what has unanimously agreed to be the front of these spaceships, a parabolic indentation 9 city blocks in diameter.
[Connie whispers in the Presidents ear. He gets up and follows her out]
You're leaving now?
If we don't act now, we may not have much of an America left to defend.
Eagle 20 - Fox 2!
[Attempts to missile again]
Eagle 20 - Fox 2!
[Julius discards a styrofoam cup]
Hey, you have any idea how long it takes for those cups to decompose?
If you don't move soon, I'm gonna start to decompose.
Now what do we do?
Address the nation. There's gonna be a lot of frightened people out there.
Yeah? I'm one of 'em.
Must go faster, must go faster!

[speaking to her mother on the telephone]
Daddy let me watch Letterman.
Traitor.
[the refugee convoy arrives outside Area 51]

[salutes]
Captain Steven Hiller, United States Marine Corps.

[returns the salute]
I'm sorry, Captain, this is a restricted area. I can't let you pass without clearance.
Okay. Come here. You want to see my clearance?
[He lifts the tarp in the bed of the pickup truck, revealing the body of the alien pilot he downed. The guard gasps and leaps back]
Maybe I'll just leave this here with you?

[to other guard]
Let 'em pass! Let 'em pass!
Get the hell out of the way!
[deleted scene]
It's a fine line between standing behind a principle and hiding behind one. You can tolerate a little compromise, if you're actually managing to get something accomplished.

[after explaining how to set up the virus in the mothership]
Do you really think you can fly that thing?
Do you really think you can do all that bullshit you just said?... Hoo!
[deleted scene]

[Jasmine is driving around the ruins of downtown Los Angeles with hurt people in the back of a dump truck and sees a preacher holding up a cross and a Bible. He is wearing a cardboard sign around his neck that says "The Time Has Come To Repent While You Can."]
The end has come! He speaketh His Word and the end hast come!
Hop on! We're headed out to El Toro.
You cannot defy what has come. It is the end!
